data.title: Nairobi National Park
data.description: A unique wildlife park located just outside the city, offering a safari experience with a view of the city skyline.

data.title: David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust
data.description: A conservation center for orphaned elephants, where you can adopt and learn about elephant conservation efforts.

data.title: Giraffe Centre
data.description: A sanctuary for the endangered Rothschild giraffe, where visitors can feed and interact with the giraffes.

data.title: Karen Blixen Museum
data.description: The former home of Danish author Karen Blixen, now a museum, offering a glimpse into her life and the history of the area.

data.title: Nairobi Railway Museum
data.description: A museum showcasing the history of Kenya's railway system, featuring old locomotives and railway artifacts.

data.title: Kazuri Beads
data.description: A pottery workshop known for its handmade ceramic beads and pottery, providing a cultural experience with a shopping opportunity.

data.title: Nairobi Railway Station
data.description: A historical landmark, famous for its colonial architecture and serving as a hub for the East African Railway network.

data.title: Ngong Hills
data.description: A scenic hilltop area offering stunning views of Nairobi, perfect for picnics, hiking, and outdoor activities.

data.title: Bomas of Kenya
data.description: A cultural center where visitors can experience traditional Kenyan music, dance performances, and cultural displays.
